title: CAMBRIDGE  $4,500 8/1 | 3 BED 2 BATHS 2 LEVELS + PARKING
posting_body: THE IN -PERSON  OPEN HOUSE WILL TAKE PLACE ON FRIDAY JULY 29 AT 6 PM AND UNTIL 7PM82 ALPINE STREET CAMBRIDGE
IF YOU CAN'T MAKE IT TO THE IN-PERSON OPEN HOUSE, JOIN OUR GOOGLE LINK FOR A TOUR HERE TO VIEW REMOTELY WHILE I AM AT THE PROPERTY.

- West Cambridge, on a residential street, a block to Danehy Park, near Fresh Pond and Alewife W.F, shops and T station - Sunny and high-end renovated 3 bed two-level condo with a private deep yard and back wooden deck.
Enter to a foyer / mudroom which leads you to an open plan living & dining with hardwood floors, recessed lightings and South-facing windows.
Beautifully appointed modern kitchen with granite tops, plenty of storage space, stainless steel appliances and door to rear deck & yard for summer dining/ lounging.
1st floor has 2 good size bedrooms sharing a tiled bathroom with tub.
Lower Level has a large family room with exterior access, W/D and a 3rd bedroom with en-suite bathroom.
Easy to park on street too.
Walk to shops and restaurants of Huron Village.
8 minutes in bus to Harvard Square (74/75/78).
THIS APARTMENT DOES NOT ALLOW PETS OR SMOKE AND THIS IS NOT NEGOTIABLE.
Appliances: Range, Dishwasher, Disposal, Microwave, Refrigerator, Washer, Dryer in unit
Tenant pay for their own utilities
